name: Number Swipe Plus
description:
Number Swipe Plus is a number puzzle game which will test your basic addition, subtraction and concentration skills. Work your way through 3 game modes with increasing difficulty. Can you solve them all?

It's simple, but it's not easy! You can fail if any square drops under 0 or goes above 99.

How to play:
- The goal is to have the same number in each square
- Every swipe changes the value of the selected square
- Yellow squares go up by 1
- Blue squares go down by 1

Features:
- Over 2700 puzzles to solve
- 3 game modes (3x3 grid / 4x4 grid / 5x5 grid)
- 5 difficulties
- 15 unique challenges every day
- Easy to learn gameplay
